Take your pick from 10 shades that are an ode to the everyday women, who are unstoppable.

products.name: Savlon Mask - BIS Certified FFP2 S Mask, Ear-loop Model with
products.description: Nykaa's Sealed With a Kiss Lip Palette is all you need to pucker and pout. This multi-tasking palette features expertly coordinated color combinations of intensely pigmented matte lip cream that gives you the coverage of a matte lipstick and blendability of a blusher. Each shade stands alone or can be blended together for a customized shade. When you can't decide on just one lip shade to buy, don't. Just pick up one of these lip palettes instead.
